subScenes.name: 打招呼邀请
subScenes.description: 朋友间自然打招呼并发出派对邀请

responses.text: Not much, just chillin'. You got something planned?
responses.text_cn: 没什么，就宅着。你有安排吗？

responses.text: Not much, but I'm open to fun!
responses.text_cn: 也没啥事，有好玩的我乐意参加！

responses.text: Just working. What's up?

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气开启邀请，避免太正式

qaPairs.speakerText: Actually, I'm throwing a small party Saturday night — wanna come?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 其实我周六晚上办个小派对，来吗？

responses.text: Yes! I'd love to! What time?
Oh cool! I'm free, sounds fun!
responses.text_cn: 哦太棒了！我有空，听起来有趣！

responses.text: Maybe, I'll let you know tomorrow.

qaPairs.usageNote: 接受邀请时要热情明确，避免含糊

subScenes.name: 确认时间地点
subScenes.description: 确认派对具体时间和地点细节

qaPairs.speakerText: It's at my place — 123 Maple St, starting at 8pm.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 在我家，枫树街123号，晚上8点开始。

responses.text: 8pm? Perfect! I'll be there!
Wait, is that near the subway?
Got it. I'll bring a bottle.

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认地点时可追问交通信息更自然

qaPairs.speakerText: Yeah, it's just two blocks from the Green Line station.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 对，离绿线地铁站就两百米。

responses.text: Awesome, I'll take the train then!
Cool, I'll drive — parking okay?
Got it, thanks!

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据出行方式追问停车或交通细节

subScenes.name: 询问携带物品
subScenes.description: 礼貌询问是否需自带食物或饮料

qaPairs.speakerText: Should I bring anything? Like snacks or drinks?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我需要带点什么吗？比如零食或饮料？

responses.text: Nah, I got food covered — just bring your vibe!
responses.text_cn: 不用，吃的我全准备了，带心情来就行！

responses.text: Actually, a bottle of wine would be awesome!
responses.text_cn: 其实带瓶红酒就太棒了！

responses.text: Anything’s fine, thanks for asking!

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应时明确需求或轻松拒绝，避免模糊

qaPairs.speakerText: I'll bring a six-pack of IPA then!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 那我带六瓶印度淡色艾尔啤酒来！

responses.text: Yes! That’s perfect — I love IPA!
Sweet, I'll grab some chips to go with it.
responses.text_cn: 太好了，我再买点薯片配着吃。

responses.text: Cool, see you there!

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应时可顺势补充细节，增强互动感

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别确认
subScenes.description: 结束对话前再次确认出席并礼貌道别

responses.text: Absolutely! Can't wait!
Yep, 8pm, Maple St — I'm on it!
responses.text_cn: 对，八点枫树街，我记住了！

responses.text: Yeah, I'll be there, thanks again!

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认出席时重复关键信息更显认真

qaPairs.speakerText: Awesome! See you Saturday then — don't be late!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太棒了！周六见啊，别迟到！

responses.text: Haha, I'll be there early with the beer!
responses.text_cn: 哈哈，我带着啤酒提前到！

responses.text: No way I'd miss it — see you then!
Got it, thanks for inviting me!

qaPairs.usageNote: 道别时用轻松语气表达感谢更显礼貌
